content:
This app implements a simple two-player game of chess. Levi developed this app in a day. It includes a button to
generate a random valid play for the current player. It currently support game play across remote machines, but Levi
plans on implementing this in the future. It currently does not support an AI player, but Levi also plans on
implementing a simple form of this in the future.

[main-url]: http://jackieandlevi.com/chess
